titles.title: Safe Interactions Act of 2023
Safe Interactions Act of 2023

To provide grants to enable nonprofit disability organizations to develop training programs that support safe interactions between law enforcement officers and individuals with disabilities and older individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Safe Interactions Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants to nonprofit disability organizations to develop training programs for law enforcement officers who may encounter individuals with disabilities.
